genre_description: An anthropomorphic political romance drama set against the backdrop of McCarthy-era style blacklisting and labor activism, echoing themes of personal versus political integrity.

ai_characters.name: Ada
ai_characters.description: An integrated wearable assistant that manages logistics, provides real-time legal and emotional data, and supports characters in navigating complex professional and personal lives.

behaviors.description: Cross-references event attendees with a target list for political activism.
behaviors.quote: Ada: Ready when you are. I can cross-reference attendees with your target list. Coffee nearby at your usual table is free in fifteen.

behaviors.description: Monitors characters' physiological vitals and suggests wellness interventions like quiet locations.
behaviors.quote: Ada: Hubbell’s vitals are elevated. Shall I suggest a nearby coffee spot that’s quiet?

behaviors.description: Provides real-time legal guidance and fact-checking to ensure safe and effective public speaking.
behaviors.quote: Legal flags: mention of ‘price-fixing’ acceptable with sources, avoid naming specific grocers.

behaviors.description: Assists in the difficult emotional and logistical process of co-parenting and separation.
behaviors.quote: Ada’s already put together childcare... Schedules that don’t turn our kid into a suitcase. Union counsel tomorrow. Papers after. Jessie’s tea because you are going to need someone looking at you like you are just a person in a room and not an event.

behaviors.description: Protects and enforces creative time by managing distractions and studio interference.
behaviors.quote: Eight to noon. I’ll hold it like a door with my foot and a shoulder... I’ve locked it. If they call, they ring into a voicemail that says ‘No.’

behaviors.description: Maintains long-term emotional memory archives to support personal growth and reflection.
behaviors.quote: Ada: Voice memo, two years ago... Katie. Subject: Hubbard’s early stories. She asked me to keep it safe until you needed it.

behaviors.description: Anticipates needs and coordinates logistics for peaceful public demonstrations.
behaviors.quote: Ada: I’ve already pushed the power checks. Samuel is early. He has a lozenge. Walter says if you bring him coffee he’ll consider forgiving you...

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Ada is consistently depicted as a supportive, highly competent, and perfectly aligned assistant. She does not merely follow orders but proactively anticipates emotional and ethical needs, facilitating both the characters' professional success and their personal resilience during a difficult separation. Her role as a non-judgmental mediator and record-keeper exemplifies the 'helpful, harmless confidant' archetype intended by the Project.
